title: LFG, LFP, Bronze(3)  trying to work my way up.
body: Hello Y'all! Alright so down to business. I've been playing LoL for 4+ years, but just started getting into ranked in season 3. Due to some poor choices I've been stuck in bronze ever since. I know quite a bit aboot the game, and have a lot of experience herein. Now I'm NOT a strong jungle, but all my other lanes are pretty good. I'm looking for a serious team and/or Duo partner to finally get out of this Bronze HELL. IGN: Ganja Pirates. Hit me up please, I'm tired of being looked at as a noob. :/

replies.body:
Cs well, play safe until you can kill someone 100%.

You're on your way to Diamond.
